ComicInfo.Title: Distant Relatives: part two; Normal
ComicInfo.Summary:
Distant Relatives: part two: Frost has a conversation with his father in the parallel universe. Meanwhile, Liz decides to get Race back, Rusty meets Cosmic Rae, and Krennick confronts Zephyr about her pregnancy.
Normal: Liz tries to move away from the Nobles following Race's death.
